BASELINE-ECONOMICAL-MODEL: Our service was built for you and your relatives.
ECONOMICAL-MODEL-SLIDE2-TITLE: No privacy issues or data used for advertisement
ECONOMICAL-MODEL-SLIDE2-TEXT: Our business model is very simple. We just want to give awesome services to our members. For example, we are going to help you to print amazing photo books or to give you the opportunity to print your family tree and so on.
ECONOMICAL-MODEL-SLIDE3-TEXT: Thank to our future information center, our partners will provide you some quality content to answer all the questions our members could have. You'll get information about recipes, DIY, bank, insurance, health, travels,.. It'll be nice!
ECONOMICAL-MODEL-SLIDE4-TEXT: For Birthdays, Christmas, weddings, or just because you want to please your relatives. Famicity is the place to create your wishlists. We'll help you to organise, to collect money, and to buy the gifts they'll definitly enjoy.
ECONOMICAL-MODEL-SLIDE5-TEXT: Nowadays it's really important to save all your digital documents. Photos, videos, pdf, all kind of them. Thanks to our safe, you will be able to save all this precious moments with your family, share them and pass them on.
ECONOMICAL-MODEL-SLIDE6-TEXT: How great it is to have these lovely books about your vacations, your baby first birthday party and so on? Famicity will help you to print everything, everywhere. Even you family tree.
BASELINE-ALBUM: Create, save and share all your albums. That's free!
ALBUM-SLIDE2-TITLE: All your pictures in one place.
ALBUM-SLIDE2-TEXT: Birthdays, weddings, vacations, bbq party, let's save all these souvenirs. We love to take pictures about every single life moment. It's now time to save them forever.
ALBUM-SLIDE3-TITLE: Show you best pictures to your loved ones.
ALBUM-SLIDE3-TEXT: Thanks to the slideshow and the pictures quality of Famicity, you can start to enjoy your relatives. Nothing but sharing great times, everywhere.
ALBUM-SLIDE4-TEXT: Camera, selfies, webcam picture, there is so many ways to enjoy and to give news thanks to a picture. Make it simple, just smile and do it. Your relatives'll definitly have a great time.
ALBUM-SLIDE5-TEXT: More than a place to share your albums, Famicity is the place to save them. We do know a lot of people who did lose memorable pictures cause he just crashed his computer or his smartphone. Don't be one of them.
ALBUM-SLIDE6-TITLE: Do you have picture of your ancestors?
ALBUM-SLIDE6-TEXT: Please save them too and pass them on before it's too late. Thanks to your family tree, all your ancestors have their own profile. Just clic on them and go to their albums area to add all the pictures you have.
ALBUM-SLIDE7-TITLE: We protect your albums and your privacy.
ALBUM-SLIDE7-TEXT: Famicity really care about privacy. All your pictures have specific protection that do not exist elsewhere
BASELINE-DIRECTORY: All your relatives, in your pocket.
DIRECTORY-SLIDE2-TEXT: For free, create your own directory on Famicity. Email addresses, phone numbers, addresses,... You will have access to all the information you need. Everytime. Everywhere.
DIRECTORY-SLIDE3-TEXT: If one of your relatives change his phone number, his address, or no matter what, your directory will be updated automatically.
DIRECTORY-SLIDE4-TEXT: Entirely secured, you'll be the only one to have access to your address book. No friends of friends, no spam. We do not sell any of your information.
DIRECTORY-SLIDE5-TEXT: Thanks to our service, you can simply sync your address book with your smartphone, you gmail contacts, or even Outlook. To invite them, you just have to click on their profiles and send an invitation.
DIRECTORY-SLIDE6-TEXT: Every single share you do on Famicity is linked to specific rights. To help you to share your publication with your relatives, you can add people to groups.
DIRECTORY-SLIDE7-TEXT: Family, in-laws, friends, association members, sport club,... you can manage all your contacts thanks to Famicity. Then, when you share something, just add your groups to give them rights to see your content.
BASELINE-CALENDAR: When the event's organisation becomes magic.
CALENDAR-SLIDE2-TEXT: A rendez-vous? A diner? A bbq party? A birthday to plan? You are now able to organize all your events easily. Let's create your event today and make it real!
CALENDAR-SLIDE3-TEXT: How great is that? Thanks to Famicity, you will have the most complete birthday reminder you never had. Each week, or even each day, we will sent you an email or a mobile notification to help you to remember all birthdays!
CALENDAR-SLIDE4-TEXT: Go to your calendar, clic on a date, add the people you want to invite and it's done! Invitations are sent automatically and you can even put a reminder. How easy is that?
CALENDAR-SLIDE5-TEXT: Event don't need to be short-lived. When it's over, you still have the right to complete it with pictures from every participants and speak about the great time you had there!
BASELINE-MAIL: Let's change the way you mail!
MAIL-SLIDE2-TEXT: None of the actual messaging boxes sound private. It's time to change the way you communicate. With Famicity you can easily choose the people who could see your messages. It's like home.
MAIL-SLIDE3-TITLE: To send messages to all your relatives.
MAIL-SLIDE3-TEXT: It's time to take care about your friends and family and to give them some news. Go to your messaging box and just create a new message. You can send it to one person as easily than groups.
MAIL-SLIDE4-TEXT: Sometime, computers are so complicated to use. We try to make it easier every day. Just sign in and start to share your stories.
MAIL-SLIDE5-TEXT: What about sharing in live with all your relatives who are miles away from you? Today you can share instant discussion. Tomorrow it'll be live discussion. Be ready to be more connected than ever.
BASELINE-NEWS-FEED: All the family and friends news. In one place. That's cool.
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE2-TITLE: Here are the news you'll enjoy!
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE2-TEXT: The first step of your nephew, the wedding of your cousin, the family parties, the bbq parties you enjoyed, you will never miss a moment.
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE3-TITLE: The more they share, the more you smile.
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE3-TEXT: Pictures, news, videos, events, Famicity is definitely a great place to be. With their own diary, your family and friends will be happy to give you some news cause they know that, on Famicity, their privacy is respected.
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE4-TEXT: We all know that today family and friends are everywhere in the world. We all have our live, and tools like phones, letters or even emails do not provide us something really great to share everyday. You'll enjoy Famicity cause it's made for that.
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE5-TEXT: How many times did you hear : my parents don't know how to use that, it's too difficult... That's why we worked directly with parents and grand-parents to create Famicity. Now everyone could enjoy it. No matter what.
NEWS-FEED-SLIDE6-TEXT: You have the entire control on your publications. You can share everything you want, it's safe.
BASELINE-FAMICITY-PRESENTATION: Share your history and pass it on.
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE2-TITLE: Here are the news you'll enjoy!
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE2-TEXT: The first step of your nephew, the wedding of your cousin, the family parties, the bbq parties you enjoyed, you will never miss a moment.
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE3-TEXT: Thanks to the slideshow and the pictures quality of Famicity, you can start to enjoy your relatives. Nothing but sharing great times, everywhere.
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE4-TEXT: Create your family tree, save your family stories and pass them on to the next generations. You can easily create biographies, scan old pictures and share them with your relatives.
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE5-TEXT: Famicity is a lovely place to connect all generations. All the family can enjoy the lastest news and albums! We work hard to provide the best service for family and we certainly have the best one on Internet.
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE6-TEXT: A rendez-vous? A diner? A bbq party? A birthday to plan? You are now able to organize all your events easily. Let's create your event today and make it real!
FAMICITY-PRESENTATION-SLIDE7-TEXT: You are the only one who control who can or can't see your publications. For each news, each album, each message, everything is perfectly clear. There won't be any news on Google or Yahoo tomorrow about what you shared here.
BASELINE-PROFILE: Help your relatives to know more about you
PROFILE-SLIDE2-TEXT: On your own profile, you can share informations such as your addresses, your phone numbers, your email to help your relatives to keep in touch with you. And that's cool!
PROFILE-SLIDE3-TEXT: To help your relatives to recognize you you are able to change to profile pitcure. You cut your hair, your look like an hispster, let's them know how you like right now :)
PROFILE-SLIDE4-TITLE: Have a look to every share.
PROFILE-SLIDE4-TEXT: If you go on the profile of one of your relatives, it's really easy to access all his or her areas such as albums, news or tree.
PROFILE-SLIDE5-TEXT: Every profile of your tree has his own data collection. If you want to, you can add some albums or biographies on any of them. Let's share what your memories.
PROFILE-SLIDE6-TEXT: You have the entire control on your publications. You can share everything you want, it's safe.
PRIVACY-SLIDE2-TEXT: More than any social network, Famicity just cares about your privacy. There is no better place to share your data if you want them to remain private.
PRIVACY-SLIDE3-TEXT: Cause Famicity respect every european guidelines about children protection on internet, they are welcome and they can share in peace with their relatives and their friends. On Famicity, to be connected with children, you have to know them in real life not just click on a button to add them as friend.
PRIVACY-SLIDE4-TEXT: We just respect our members and our families. We do not sell their data to anybody as it sounds to be the general way to earn money on internet.
PRIVACY-SLIDE5-TEXT: For us, that sounds normal to let you delete your data if you want to. Even your entire profile if you do not need our service anymore. You're free to join, and free to go. Welcome on social network that take care about people not just about data.
PRIVACY-SLIDE6-TEXT: As you know privacy is a global matter on Famicity. That's why there is no public search engine (such as Google, Yahoo or bing) that are allowed to scan you information. If someone enter your name on Google, their will no know that you have a Famicity account.
PRIVACY-SLIDE7-TITLE: A private social network for friends and family
PRIVACY-SLIDE7-TEXT: Famicity is a new kind of social network. We are even sure we are a social network. What we know is that we do not want to let everybody see your content. If you're looking to be the next famous star, you're in the wrong place. Except if you're looking for some relief.
BASELINE-FAMILY-TREE: Build your family tree for free
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE2-TEXT: If you are a genealogist and want to create your tree, you have to know that Famicity has an awesome service for you. We want to be the place to share all your researches with you relatives and that is amazing.
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE3-TEXT: We all have a story to tell. The grand father of Guillaume (co-founder of Famicity) works on his family history but it was a nightmare to share all these stories he found. That's the reason why he started to create Famicity with Jerome (co-founder of Famicity).
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE4-TEXT: Create your family tree, save your family stories and pass them on to the next generations. You can easily create biographies, scan old pictures and share them with your relatives.
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE5-TITLE: Go further. Write the history of your ancestors.
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE5-TEXT: Maybe you are lucky enough to have access to the history of your family thanks to old papers or old pictures. It's time to make them digital and to save them. Famicity is definitly the best place to do it.
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE6-TEXT: Sometime, our members enjoyed Famicity so much they decide to contribute, and give us some idea. A mother told us it could be cool to share her little daughter adventure on her profile. We made it for her and now everybody use it!
FAMILY-TREE-SLIDE7-TEXT: GEDCOM is a genealogy standard that helps you to import/export your family tree from one software to another. Famicity is compatible with GEDCOM format. If you have one, just try it! Your tree'll be created in few minutes. And it's free.

ABOUT_PAGE_INTRO: Famicity is a service that allows every people to preserve and enhance their legacy. We expect to revolutionize the way family and friends are sharing by giving them a new place. Our service is available on computers, tablets and smartphones. You can already give it a try and enjoy great moments with family by creating your family tree and share the history of your ancestors. It's simple and made for every one from 7 to 107 years old!
THE_SHORT_HISTORY:
Jerome and Guillaume met during their study in SUPINFO, a great ingineers school in Paris. Very soon they decided to create a company to satisfy their passion for internet
Famicity started with a simple question. How to allow families and friends to maintain contact through the internet without having to share their private life with all the world?
Indeed, the two young ingineers are not fans of how actual social networks operate and resell the data of their users. They want to offer a real alternative to those who want to share privately. They begin to imagine the concept of FAMICITY, a site where user data are not exploited or sold. A site where if you decide to delete the content it is really deleted. A site where you can upload photos without having the surprise to find them few days later in the search engines, visible to anyone. A place where children are not encouraged to get in touch with strangers without any control.
Their second concern was to offer to Lucien, the grandfather of Guillaume, a simple and visual website where he could enjoy and share his family genealogical researches to pass them on.
After years of work, FAMICITY emerged and allowed families to share moments of life in private.
ABOUT_PAGE_QUOTE: Whoever does not know from where he comes from can not know where he goes.
GUILLAUME_DESCRIPTION: Guillaume is at the origin of the concept of Famicity in 2007. Today he is the CEO and manages the Marketing Department. He ensures that all new members are welcomed on FAMICITY and enjoy every moments. It also manages with public relations, partnerships and funding ressources.
JEROME_DESCRIPTION: SUPINFO engineer, Jerome is the talented developer who has fully developed the first versions of Famicity. Ruby On Rails enthusiast, he manages all the technical part of the site and ensures that you can use FAMICITY everyday without any trouble. Of course, it is also thanks to Jerome that the site evolves every day and that FAMICITY already has so many amazing features.
SIMON_DESCRIPTION: After succeeding in entrepreneurship, Simon Pierre joined the Famicity co-founders. He manages the sales Department. he also manages to promote FAMICITY everywhere and to the largest number. He enjoyed the fact that our community is growing everyday and that all the people will be able to share moments of happiness in privacy, without being exploited.
JEREMY_DESCRIPTION: Jérémy est passionné par le web. Il soutient Jérôme dans le développement du site. Jedi de la programmation, il s'occupe avec brio de l'application mobile, de la refonte du site, de Facebook Connect,...et de beaucoup d'autres fonctionnalités dont vous serez très vite informé.
PASCAL_DESCRIPTION: Talented engineer, Pascal helps Jerome to build the CRM tools. His work allows us to answer more easily to your requests and offer you a better experience on Famicity. Pascal is captivated by everything related to new technologies. Tchiip!
LUC_DESCRIPTION:
Luc is a huge fan of Ruby language and all about the new technologies.
He works on the invisible part of the website. He ensures that you can have access to Famicity by developping the « Back-End ». In other words, he’s coding all the functions which allow you to receive the good contents at the right time.
NICOLAS_DESCRIPTION:
Nicolas helps Jérôme and Kajan to create a dynamic and responsive website.
With Kajan, they create all the webpages interactivity by following the recommandation of Nathalie, our great designer. Thanks to them, you can take advantage of Famicity very easily. Bonus: He loves turtles!
NATHALIE_DESCRIPTION: After years of working as a designer in womenswear, Nathalie is now a talented web designer. She takes care of the Famicity design to give you a site that meets your needs and give your the best experience.
IVAN_DESCRIPTION: Futur ingénieur, Ivan est passionné de Ruby On Rails. Il prête main forte à Jérôme, Jérémy et Pascal. Il profite de son contrat de professionnalisation pour continuer à se former pour devenir le super ninja de la programmation.
AUDREY_DESCRIPTION: Communication / marketing student, Audrey works on every marketing tasks. In addition, she is the little angel who read all your messages to help when you need. Did you already have a discussion with her? Isn't she so sweet?
KAJAN_DESCRIPTION:
Kajan works on all the visible part of the site.
Passionate by AngularJS and Javascript technologies, he ensures that everything works fine and automatically adapts to your screen (PC, tablet or mobile). Thus, he allows you to share your unforgettable moments with your family more easily.
JIMMY_DESCRIPTION: Seeking to approach technological limits, Jimmy start himself a huge challenge. The challenge to address compatibility and implementation of the GEDCOM format (standard genealogy) on Famicity. Thanks to him, you will not have to redo all your tree, you can simply import your genealogy files!
FABIEN_DESCRIPTION: Fabien tracks every little problems that may occur on the site as well as on mobile applications. Thanks to his eagle eye, you have access to Famicity without a hitch and can enjoy it on any devices.
ZOE_DESCRIPTION: Zoe is our community manager, she certainly help you to find Famicity on this huge ocean that internet is. She wrote every Famicity news, make you discover amazing stuff on Twitter and help you to share with your family by creating the best environment! Let's follow her!
BRUNO_DESCRIPTION: Thanks to Bruno, Famicity has a genious infrastructure to absorb the growth of our community. We are ready to welcome all the families of the world, with an instant delivery service, always on top!
FREDERIC_DESCRIPTION: You always need gret help to start a product and a company. Frédéric is the one who allowed FAMICITY to have its first English version and helped the co-founder to put FAMICITY on paper to start in the best conditions.
LUCIEN_DESCRIPTION: Lucien or pépé Lulu gave the idea to Guillaume and Jerome to create FAMICITY. No more than a grand-father and a family lover. Thank you.

Compte Personnel : désigne les données personnelles relatives à un Utilisateur, comprenant notamment ses Identifiants, dont l'enregistrement est nécessaire pour accéder à l'ensemble des fonctionnalités de Famicity.com et au(x) Service(s).

Identifiants : désigne l’adresse email, ainsi que tout code confidentiel ou mot de passe choisis par l’utilisateur ou attribués par FAMICITY et permettant à l’utilisateur de s’identifier afin d’accéder à son espace.

Inscription : désigne la procédure que l’Utilisateur doit accomplir sur www.famicity.com afin de pouvoir accéder au(x) service(s). Cette inscription conduit à la création des Identifiants et du Compte Personnel de l’Utilisateur.

Service(s) ou Site Web : désigne l'un ou l'ensemble des services fournis par FAMICITY et accessibles en ligne à partir du site web « Famicity.com »

Famicity.com : désigne le site Internet, accessible à l'adresse www.famicity.com, permettant d'accéder aux Services soumis aux présentes CGU.

FAMICITY : désigne la société fournissant les Services et dont les coordonnées figurent à l'article 7 des présentes CGU.

TERMS_BLOCK2_TITLE: 2. Objet des CGU et version en vigueur

La version des présentes CGU qui prévaut est celle qui est accessible en ligne à l'adresse suivante : https://www.famicity.com/legal/. FAMICITY est libre de modifier, à tout moment, les présentes CGU, afin notamment de prendre en compte toute évolution légale, jurisprudentielle, éditoriale et/ou technique.
TERMS_BLOCK3_TEXT:
Modalités générales d'Inscription aux Services en ligne et de création de son Compte Personnel

L'inscription à FAMICITY est gratuite et peut être à tout moment résiliée sur demande de l'utilisateur.

Lors de son Inscription en ligne, l'Utilisateur peut utiliser un pseudonyme, cependant il s'engage à ne pas créer une fausse identité de nature à induire FAMICITY ou les tiers en erreur et à ne pas usurper l'identité d'une autre personne morale ou physique.

Après validation des CGU et la création de son Compte Personnel, l'Utilisateur reçoit un premier e-mail dans sa messagerie personnelle, lui restituant l'adresse mail avec laquelle il s'est inscrit au Service

Dans l'hypothèse où l'Utilisateur fournirait des informations fausses, inexactes, périmées, incomplètes, trompeuses ou de nature à induire en erreur, FAMICITY pourra, immédiatement sans préavis ni indemnité, suspendre ou résilier le Compte Personnel de l'Utilisateur et lui refuser l'accès, de façon temporaire ou définitive à tout ou partie des Services

Modalités particulières d'inscription aux Services par des mineurs

Il est rappelé aux parents et à toute personne exerçant l'autorité parentale, qu'il leur appartient, d'une part, de déterminer quel(s) Service(s) leur enfant mineur est autorisé à utiliser et, d'autre part, de surveiller l'utilisation que celui-ci fait de ce(s) Service(s).

Les mineurs sont admis à s'inscrire, à la condition expresse qu'ils aient préalablement obtenu de leurs parents (ou de la personne exerçant l'autorité parentale) l'autorisation de le faire. Le fait pour eux de s'inscrire implique qu'ils ont obtenu cette autorisation préalable. FAMICITY se réserve le droit d'en demander la justification écrite à tout moment, et de procéder à toutes vérifications, ainsi que de supprimer tout Compte Personnel dont le titulaire mineur ne remettrait pas immédiatement ladite justification, ou éventuellement dans le délai qui lui serait imparti. FAMICITY supprimera immédiatement tout Compte Personnel, dès la réception par ses services d'une demande parentale de fermeture du Compte Personnel et des Contenus y afférents.
TERMS_BLOCK4_TEXT:
Obligation de l'Utilisateur relative à ses Identifiants et son Compte Personnel

Le Compte Personnel d'un Utilisateur comprend notamment ses Identifiants, confiés par FAMICITY et placés sous la responsabilité exclusive de l'Utilisateur. L'Utilisateur s'oblige à les conserver secrets et à ne pas les divulguer sous quelque forme que ce soit. Si l'un des éléments d'identification de l'Utilisateur est perdu ou volé, ce dernier doit informer sans délai FAMICITY, qui procédera alors à l'annulation et/ou la mise à jour immédiate(s) de l'Identifiant concerné.

L'Utilisateur est seul responsable de l'utilisation qui est faite de ses Identifiants, même si l'Utilisateur pré-enregistre sur son ordinateur, son téléphone mobile ou sur n'importe quel autre type d'équipement son Identifiant, permettant ainsi la connexion automatique aux Services.

Tout accès, utilisation des Services et transmission de données effectués à partir du Compte d'un Utilisateur sera réputé avoir été effectué par ce dernier. La sauvegarde de la confidentialité du mot de passe confié à l'Utilisateur relève de l'entière responsabilité de ce dernier. A cet égard, l'Utilisateur est tenu de s'assurer qu'à l'issue de chaque session il se déconnecte effectivement des Services, en particulier lorsqu'il accède aux Services à partir d'un ordinateur public.
TERMS_BLOCK5_TEXT:
FAMICITY fournit aux Utilisateurs une plateforme interactive, laquelle comprend, sans que cette énumération puisse être considérée comme exhaustive, des services d'hébergement de journaux personnels illustrés en ligne (blog), d’albums photo, de profils, de dépôts de commentaires, de contenus éditoriaux, d'informations, de gestion d'événements, de courriers électroniques ainsi que la possibilité de créer un arbre généalogique.

L'insertion des Contenus est effectuée à l'aide du navigateur de l'Utilisateur ou grâce à un autre procédé technique d'entrée des données. Les informations déposées par un Utilisateur ne sont accessibles à un tiers que si celui-ci a été ajouté comme faisant partie de sa famille ou de ses amis. L'Utilisateur s'engage à modérer obligatoirement ses commentaires. Le profil ne doit contenir aucune information contraire à l'ordre public ou aux bonnes mœurs.

FAMICITY ne garantit pas la véracité, la probité ou l'honnêteté de ce Contenu. FAMICITY ne pourra être tenu pour responsable des fausses déclarations faites par un Utilisateur et dégage toute responsabilité lors de rencontres entre Utilisateurs suite à l'utilisation du Service.

L'ensemble des données transmises par l'Utilisateur est utilisé dans le seul but de communiquer, via le service FAMICITY, avec les membres de sa famille et ses amis. Aucune utilisation commerciale des données n'est faite par FAMICITY comme spécifié dans sa charte de confidentialité.

Le Service de « journal »

FAMICITY met à disposition un Service d'hébergement de Contenus numériques produits par les Utilisateurs, intitulé « Journal ». Chaque Utilisateur a la possibilité de publier sous sa pleine et entière responsabilité une ou plusieurs pages (regroupées sous le terme de journal) le présentant aux membres de sa famille et/ou à ses amis. L'Utilisateur peut également, sans que cette énumération soit limitative, écrire un commentaire à l’un de ses amis et/ou à un membre de sa famille depuis son journal sur chacun des posts qu'il publie.

L'Utilisateur déclare être le propriétaire de tous les Contenus associés et présentés sur son Journal et qu'ils sont libres de tous droits. A défaut, l'Utilisateur est réputé disposer de l'autorisation du titulaire des droits d'un Contenu qu'il associerait à son Journal. L'Utilisateur ne peut enregistrer ou transmettre des Contenus qui enfreignent les droits de propriété intellectuelle d'autres personnes, comme des textes, des images de personnes ou de biens, des secrets commerciaux, des informations internes ou confidentielles, cette énumération n'étant pas limitative.

Le service d’ « Albums »

FAMICITY met à disposition un Service d’hébergement de Contenus numériques produits par les utilisateurs, intitulé « Albums ».

Ces photos sont stockées grâce aux services d’Amazon S3 et font l’objet de protection particulière visant à empêcher quiconque, autre que les Membres acceptés par l’Utilisateur comme faisant partie de sa famille ou de ses amis, à visualiser cette photo par un système de clé publique/clé privée lié au Site Web.

Chaque Utilisateur a la possibilité de publier sous sa pleine et entière responsabilité une ou plusieurs photos (regroupées sous le terme d’album) le présentant aux membres de sa famille et/ou à ses amis. L'Utilisateur peut également, sans que cette énumération soit limitative, écrire un commentaire à l’un de ses amis et/ou à un membre de sa famille depuis ses albums sur chacune des photos qu'il publie.

Famicity recommandent à chaque Utilisateur de ne pas mettre en ligne des images ou des informations concernant d'autres personnes sans le consentement de celles-ci.

Le Service de « Chroniques »

FAMICITY propose à des partenaires commerciaux de publier des chroniques afin de partager conseils, utilité d'un produit, passions, histoire ou toute autre donnée susceptible d'intéresser l'ensemble de la Communauté. Ce partage fait cependant l'objet d'un contrôle de la part de FAMICITY. Toute demande de publication sera examinée avant d'être publiée afin de garantir le respect du droit Français en vigueur, des présentes Conditions d'Utilisation ainsi que l'adéquation avec l'image de FAMICITY.

Le service de « Messagerie »

FAMICITY met à disposition un Service d’hébergement de Contenus numériques produits par les utilisateurs, intitulé « Messagerie ».

Le Service permet aux Utilisateurs de Famicity de s'échanger des messages écrits et peut également contenir des photos. Ces messages peuvent être adressé à l'ensemble de la communauté de manière individuelle ou à plusieurs personnes ou Groupes de personnes avec lesquels l'Utilisation à une relation familiale ou amicale.'

Chaque Utilisateur a la possibilité d'écrire sous sa pleine et entière responsabilité un ou plusieurs messages le présentant aux membres de sa famille et/ou à ses amis. L'Utilisateur peut également, sans que cette énumération soit limitative, répondre à l’un de ses amis et/ou à un membre de sa famille à chaque message qu'ils lui transmettent.

L’Utilisateur s'engage à modérer les messages déposés par des tiers afin que ces derniers ne contreviennent pas aux présentes conditions et a fortiori aux lois et usages en vigueur.

Conformément à l'article 6 alinéa 7 de la Loi n° 2004-575 du 21 juin 2004 pour la confiance dans l'économie numérique, FAMICITY met en place un dispositif de signalement identifié par le lien « Nous contacter » facilement accessible et visible par tous permettant aux Utilisateurs du Service de porter à sa connaissance toutes données faisant l'apologie des crimes contre l'humanité, incitant à la haine raciale ou la pornographie enfantine, incitant à la violence ou attentatoires à la dignité humaine, ainsi que contre les infractions visées au cinquième et huitième alinéas de l'article 24 de la loi du 29 juillet 1881 sur la liberté de la presse, et aux articles 227-23 et 227-24 du Code pénal.

Le service « Import de contacts »

FAMICITY met à disposition de ces utilisateurs un service d'import de contacts. Ce service est assuré par un composant fourni par la société Cloudsponge. Cloudsponge s'engage à ne pas conserver les contacts importés transitant par son service au delà de la durée nécessaire au bon déroulement de l'import comme indiqué dans leurs propres conditions d'utilisation : http://www.cloudsponge.com/privacy à la rubrique "Your Customers' Contacts".

L'Utilisateur reconnaît être informé et accepte le fait que FAMICITY ne peut être, à aucun titre, tenue pour responsable de la création, de la modification, de la suppression, ou du défaut de réception, d'émission, de transmission ou de stockage de données des Utilisateurs, relevant de l'unique et entière responsabilité de ces derniers. L'Utilisateur déclare et reconnaît être conscient que toutes les informations, données, textes, logiciels, musiques, sons, photographies, images, vidéos, messages ou tous autres contenus ou tous autres matériels (ci-avant et ci-après dénommés collectivement le « Contenu ») qu'ils soient portés à la connaissance du public ou transmis de manière privée, sont sous la seule responsabilité de la personne ayant émis ce Contenu. L'Utilisateur seul, et non FAMICITY, est entièrement responsable du Contenu qu'il affiche, télécharge, envoie ou transmet de quelque manière que ce soit par les Services. Sauf stipulation contraire expresse dans les présentes, FAMICITY n'exerce pas de contrôle du Contenu transmis via les Services et en conséquence ne garantit pas l'opportunité, la licéité, la probité ou la qualité de ce Contenu. En toutes hypothèses, FAMICITY ne pourra en aucun cas être tenue pour responsable du Contenu, notamment du caractère illégal du Contenu au regard de la réglementation en vigueur, d'erreur ou d'omission dans tout Contenu, de toute perte ou dommage consécutifs à l'utilisation de tout Contenu affiché, transmis via les Services. De manière générale, l'Utilisateur s'engage à se conformer à l'ensemble des lois et réglementations en vigueur concernant l'interdiction de la diffusion d'images pornographiques, pédophiles, obscènes, ou de nature à porter gravement atteinte à la dignité humaine.

Propriété intellectuelle et droits d'auteur

FAMICITY est propriétaire exclusif de tous les droits de propriété intellectuelle sur la structure du site Web ou a acquis régulièrement les droits permettant l'exploitation du site Web, sans aucune limitation.

FAMICITY concède à l'utilisateur, le droit d'utiliser le site Web et le Service pour ses besoins, à l'exclusion de toute utilisation lucrative.

Sous réserve des droits concédés ci-dessus à l'utilisateur, il est notamment interdit de copier, reproduire, représenter, modifier et/ou exploiter, de quelque façon que ce soit et à quelque fin que ce soit, tout ou partie de la structure et du contenu du Service et du site Web.

FAMICITY a déposé son site Internet auprès de Copyright France sous le numéro 3N3318A. Ce certificat de dépot est accessible à cet endroit.

Protection de la vie privée et des données à caractère personnel des Utilisateurs

FAMICITY respecte les libertés fondamentales et en particulier le droit au respect de la vie privée des Utilisateurs. En application de la loi n°78-17 du 6 janvier 1978 modifiée par la loi n°2004-801 du 06 Août 2004 relative à l'informatique, aux fichiers et aux libertés, chaque Utilisateur ou non Utilisateur dispose des droits d'opposition, d'accès et de rectification des données le concernant. Il peut ainsi exiger que soient rectifiées, complétées, clarifiées, mises à jour ou effacées les informations le concernant qui sont inexactes, incomplètes, équivoques, ou périmées.

À la clôture du Compte Personnel d'un Utilisateur, pour quelque cause que ce soit, les données relatives à ce compte, sont effacées. Cependant, conformément au Décret n° 2011-219 du 25 février 2011 relatif à la conservation et à la communication des données permettant d'identifier toute personne ayant contribué à la création d'un contenu mis en ligne (Cliquez ici pour consulter le décret), certaines données peuvent être conservées pour une durée maximale de un an.

Le système permet d'ajouter les données personnelles relatives à une personne et aux membres directs de sa famille dans le but de créer un arbre généalogique complet. Ceci doit être signalé car les limitations mentionnées ci-dessus sont applicables dans les deux sens, c'est à dire aux personnes ajoutant leurs propres références comme à celles qui ajoutent des références à d'autres personnes.

Une personne non inscrite sur le Service pourra contacter FAMICITY afin de faire supprimer des données la concernant. Dans ce cas, une pièce d'identité pourra être demandée.

Aucun utilisateur (enregistré ou non) ne doit violer le système de sécurité de FAMICITY. Toute tentative dans ce sens impliquera immédiatement le recours aux actions légales pertinentes tant civiles que pénales. Parmi les atteintes les plus fréquentes, il convient de mentionner sans être exhaustif :
  • Tester ou évaluer la vulnérabilité du système ou du réseau.

COOKIES_NOTIFICATION: By pursuing your navigation on this website, you accept the use of cookies to customize your navigation.
COOKIES_INFORMATION_1: Famicity.com may install cookies on your web browser when you use our services. Cookies are essential for the proper use of Internet and are used by most of the major websites. A cookie is a small text file sent to your browser by websites if your settings allow them. A cookie contains information about your use of the service, such as a token related to your connection access, your language choice or other parameters. That allows famicity.com system to improve your user experience and secure our service.
COOKIES_INFORMATION_2: Most Internet browsers automatically accept cookies, you can set your browser by modifying its parameters to stop accepting cookies or to alert you before accepting a cookie from the websites you visit. However, without cookies, it will be impossible to sign in with your famicity.com's account because we use cookie to accept your connection.
COOKIES_INFORMATION_3: Warning: By refusing cookies, you won't be able to use products or services offered by famicity.com that require a private session.

BASE.SIGNUP: Famicity allows all families around the world to share great moments together and for free. Albums, family tree, calendar, address book, and more, in total privacy.
BASE.SIGN-IN: Let's sign in and share with all your family members like in your own home.

PUBLIC.WELCOME: Famicity allows all families around the world to share great moments together and for free. Albums, family tree, calendar, address book, and more, in total privacy.
PUBLIC.TERMS: Famicity cares about privacy and is the first social network to respect guidelines about privacy, children protection and right to forget.
PUBLIC.ABOUT: Famicity was created by an awesome team who just want to help you to share and pass your history on. Let's discover us!
PUBLIC.FAMICITY-PRESENTATION: You can use Famicity to give news, share albums, create amazing events, chat and way more.
PUBLIC.PASSWORD_RECOVERIES: Famicity is safe and private. If you forgot your password, do not worry, just click here to create a new one.
PUBLIC.PRIVACY: Privacy is key here. Your data is confidential See our privacy policy. Famicity do not sell or exploit your data to make money.
PUBLIC.ECONOMICAL-MODEL: Famicity is totally free. Our business model is based on services not advertisement.
PUBLIC.CONTACT: Famicity team is always there for you. If you need any help do not hesitate to contact us.
PUBLIC.NEWS-FEED: Famicity is the best social network to share with your friends and your family. Give news, share albums, create events and more for free.
PUBLIC.FAMILY-TREE: Create your family tree for free and without any limits. Build your tree and write the biographies of your ancetors.
PUBLIC.ALBUM: Create your albums and share your pictures with your family and your friends. Famicity is free and respect your privacy.
PUBLIC.DIRECTORY: Create your family address book to collect all contacts and create your events.
PUBLIC.MAIL: Famicity allows you to chat instantly with your family and your friends in private.
PUBLIC.CALENDAR: Create your event easily to organize a wedding, Christmas party, a Bar Mitzvah, vacations, or a friends meetup.
PUBLIC.PROFILE: Your profile is confidential. Your data are only shared with the people you choose.
PUBLIC.HELPS: If you need help on Famicity, here are the answers to the questions you could have.
PUBLIC.HELPS-CONTACTS: Your address book helps you to find the contacts of your relatives and allows you to create groups to manage your sharings' permissions
PUBLIC.HELPS-PROFILE: Your profile page is useful to share some information about you to your family. Contacts, activities, passions,…
PUBLIC.HELPS-CHAT: Your inbox on Famicity allows you to share messages with people you know. You can message from one to multiple people
PUBLIC.HELPS-ALBUMS: You can create your albums easily. Your pictures are saved and accessible anywhere and you can share them with your loved ones.
PUBLIC.HELPS-EVENTS: Let's create an event on Famicity. Thanks to your calendar, organize it is easy
PUBLIC.HELPS-HOME: Let's have a look to your newsfeed to see every updates about your friends and family.
PUBLIC.HELPS-RIGHTS: On Famicity, you know who can see your publications. Let's see how to add permission to them.
PUBLIC.HELPS-COMMENTS: With comments, everything is more fun! See how to comment every publications
PUBLIC.HELPS-FUSIONS: One of your relatives has created a family tree by himself? Let's see how to merge your both trees.
PUBLIC.HELPS-ARTICLES: Famicity gives you some advices to have a better life. Let's see some articles about that.
PUBLIC.HELPS-INVITATIONS: Famicity is more funny with all the family and friends involved. Let's see how to invite them.
PUBLIC.HELPS-BIOGRAPHY: Famicity allows you to create your family tree and add all the pictures and notes about your ancestors to pass them on.
PUBLIC.HELPS-PARAMETERS: The settings allow you to have more control about your informations. Let's see what you can do.
PUBLIC.HELPS-BLOG: Your diary is the place where you write news to your family. Do you know you can add pictures, title or even video there?
PUBLIC.HELPS-TREE: Create your family tree for free and share your ancestors stories with your family. GEDCOM format is available here! Let's import you tree!
PUBLIC.HELPS-GEDCOM: Discover how to create quickly you family tree by importing your GEDCOM file.
PUBLIC.LANDING-MCDO: Find your ancestors and create your family tree on Famicity. It's easy and made for all the family. Subscribe now, it's free and private.

BANNER.TITLE: A unique place to write and share your story

SLIDE_WHAT.TITLE: A unique place to write and share your story
SLIDE_WHAT.TEXT:
We all live unique events in our lives that deserve to be preserve and shared with the people we love.

Famicity helps you to gather your loved ones in order to tell the stories past and present in a fun way!

SLIDE_TREE.TITLE: Build your tree with your family
SLIDE_TREE.TEXT: Famicity is compatible with genealogy software such as Ancestry, Geni, FamilySearch, and more. With just a few clicks, import your GEDCOM file, synchronize your researches and make them available to your children and grandchildren!

SLIDE_SHARE.TITLE: Put in common true treasures
SLIDE_SHARE.TEXT:
Your whole family will be able to enrich the family tree. This is an opportunity to take out the photos and documents shut away in the shoe boxes.

Thus, it will be available to all! It will complete biographies and everyone will make great discoveries!

SLIDE_FUSION.TITLE: Connect the branches of your family tree
SLIDE_FUSION.TEXT: Thanks to an exclusive technology, Famicity allows you to merge the ancestry and the progeny of your family. Let's import your Gedcom files and have a look to our beautiful tree.

SLIDE_PRIVACY.TITLE:
Your data
always belong to you.
SLIDE_PRIVACY.FOUNDER_QUOTE_1:
Famicity was designed as a banking website. Here we share my family history and, for me, it is very precious.

Guillaume Co-founder / CEO
SLIDE_PRIVACY.FOUNDER_QUOTE_2:
What I love on Famicity is that I can share my baby pictures in privacy. The only people who can see them are the one I choose. They won’t be indexed by search engines and it changes everything.

Jérôme Co-fondateur / CTO

SLIDE_ENGAGE.TITLE:
{{count|number}}
families trust us!
TEXT:
After 10 years without being able to share my family tree, I finally found a website to make it right. What a relief! Now it's on Famicity and the fact that my family has been involved, my tree has doubled and even tripled its size. Thank you.

Michel. R

How great to have the mobile apps to follow my family updates. Now, even the children of the family enjoy to share with the « old geek » like me!

Yvéric C.

Famicity is really easy to use, the most family friendly website and its evolutions are impressives. The oldest of us are really happy cause they use it without any help and they feel like they are the coolest up to date people in the world :-). And that feels good! 

Yvéric C.

My family lives all around the world. Now everyone knows what « history » happened to the other. Most of our news are shared through Famicity! Our events, the pictures of the children, our travels , and also the birthdays' posts... Everything is here and we enjoy it!

Perrine. LB

This summer, something amazing happened. Our granny who gathers all of us since our childhood, got a tablet for her 83th birthday. Her wish... download the famicity app in order to be with everyone. Damn, we are crazy about Famicity, so thank you!!

Perrine. LB

Really great!! A link with the family and friends that I definitly want to preserve.

V. R.

I'm a mom who has two children abroad and I am pleased to see them often thanks to you. Thank you a thousand times!!!!!!!

Catherine D.
